data.title: Mr. Coffee® Espresso Maker -  Making Capuccino & Latte
data.description: Make espresso, cappuccino and lattes like a true barista. The Mr. Coffee® Café Espresso uses a 15-bar pump system that brews rich, creme-topped espresso with impressive results and milk froth for creamy cappuccinos and lattes.

data.title: Craft Coffee Brewers | KitchenAid
data.description: We studied the artistry of hand-crafted coffee and engineered all of our craft coffee brewers to provide an authentic, aromatic experience at home. Each brewer was designed to extract a full, satisfying flavor you’ll want to savor. It’s home-brewed, craft coffee at the touch of a button. http://kitchenaidcraftcoffee.com/

asset.title: Craft Coffee Brewers | KitchenAid
asset.description: We studied the artistry of hand-crafted coffee and engineered all of our craft coffee brewers to provide an authentic, aromatic experience at home. data.title: Life Tastes Better With Coffee | KitchenAid
data.description: Our goal in creating the Siphon Coffee Brewer, Pour Over Coffee Brewer, Precision Press Coffee Maker and Burr Grinder was to bring the coffeehouse experience into the home by automating brewing methods celebrated within coffeehouse culture. We studied the art and science of many craft brewing methods in order to create coffee brewers that deliver the precision and mastery of the best baristas. Now, it’s simple to enjoy an authentic cup of craft coffee at home—because life tastes better with coffee. http://kitchenaidcraftcoffee.com
